column4: wɔyɛ mbusu ndwuma; Obi nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ papa."

column3: Dɛ obohu dɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ badwembanyi
column4: Obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ekyir kwan."

column2: "Hɔn nyinara aman nkyɛn; hɔn nyina ho ayɛ nkɔnkɔw; Obi nnyi hɔ a ɔyɛ papa
"Ana emumuyɛfo nyinara nnyi nyimdzee? Hɔn a wodzi me nam dɛ mbrɛ wodzi edziban

column3: hɔ na hɔn ho bɔpopo kɛse: Osiandɛ Nyankopɔn ka atseneneefo mbasantsen ho."

column2: "Hom ma ɔbɔbɔfo tsirmu apam yɛ gyan
"Ao nkyɛ Israel nkwagye eefi Zion aba! Aber a EWURADZE dze ne man hɔn egyapadze bɛsan aba no
